data.prayer: Father, we ask for 1,116 new simple churches in the state of Hyōgo, Japan. Place a simple church in every community of the 5,583,000 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hyōgo, Japan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 31,610 believers in Hyōgo to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Hyōgo, Japan.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 5,583,000 people living in Hyōgo through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Hyōgo, Japan to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Burakumin people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Hyōgo, Japan a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Hyōgo, Japan to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Hyōgo, Japan the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
